AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fire Obsessed Warrior
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been obsessed with fire, [PAWN_possessive] will raze villiages and hives alike to the ground after a raid. \nThis obsession also makes [PAWN_pronoun] a fantastic cook, oddly.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Apini Hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of many charged with hunting down any and all of the disgusting Apini. [PAWN_pronoun] does this quite well, and without remorse.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ringfighting Champion
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Of many violent Azuri pass-times and cultural phenomena, gladitorial-like ring fighting is all the buzz. [PAWN_nameDef] was the ringfighting champion of [PAWN_possessive] hive, and slated to rise to the top of all Azuri. \nSadly [PAWN_pronoun] was permanently banned from future participation after tearing out the antennae of another Azuri after the match had ended. \n[PAWN_nameDef] is exceptionally well familiar in hand to hand combat and dislikes ranged weaponry.
